song.title: First Samurai (Short Edit)
song.info:
Someone (Alex) asked me, if i can make a remix of first samurai. i start to remix the track, and i think the drums of first samurai is a big part that we remember. I use the original drums from the amiga in this remix too. i have remix the completly track but i think is is too long for the CD. I make 2 Versions of it. The SHOIRT Edit and the Extended Edit. I hope i can made someone happy with this remix of First Samurai except Alex.
I hope you understand my broken english.
nice greets from germany.
Your CZ-Tunes
